Seizures and abnormalities of the tissue that connects the left and right halves of the brain (corpus callosum) have also been reported in people with this condition.",GHR,Lujan syndrome
How many people are affected by Lujan syndrome ?,"Lujan syndrome appears to be an uncommon condition, but its prevalence is unknown.",GHR,Lujan syndrome
